response.original_title: Mozart: Die Entführung aus dem Serail
response.overview: Conductor Gustav Kuhn leads the renowned London Philharmonic Orchestra in this 1980 performance of Mozart's comedic opera and first popular work, "Die Entfuhrung aus dem Serail." Set in a lavish Turkish palace, the three-act opera recounts an adventurous tale involving pirates, a greedy Pasha, and harem girls being held against their will. Ryland Davies, Valerie Masterson, Lillian Watson and Willard White star.
response.title: Mozart: Die Entführung aus dem Serail
